ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 13 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D7100 Digital SLR Camera Body + <2> Nikon 18-200mm VR II AF-S Lens + <3> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case +
<4> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card + <5> Spare EN-EL15 Battery + <6> Vivitar 72mm UV Glass Filter +
<7> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <8> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <9> HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<10> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <11> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <12> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <13> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D7100 Digital SLR Camera Body with 18-200mm VR Lens + 32GB Card + Case + Battery + Filter + Tripod + Accessory Kit
